title: First school term to end on Friday (20)
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); The first phase of the first school term of Government and Government approved private schools will end tomorrow (20), says the Ministry of Education.
Issuing a release, the Ministry of Education stated that the second phase of the first school term will commence again on 06th June.
Moreover, the G.C.E. Ordinary Level Examination will recommence on 23rd of May, and the Examinations Department stated that all necessary arrangements have been made for the recommencement.
Happy to have created a peaceful country: Gen. Shavendra Silva
Friday (20) declared a holiday for State & State-approved private schools
